data.text: Young people from around the 🌍 will gather in NYC on Saturday for the UN's largest youth gathering on #ClimateAction. Get the details here ➡️ https://t.co/q6Dtp1HljR https://t.co/BOSFYW1ReG

The formula for tackling the challenges facing the world is more international cooperation, says @antonioguterres. 

More from the Secretary-General ahead of next week's #UNGA. https://t.co/c98TT3C4ID https://t.co/ZVG5iixL2b

Syria: Security Council did not reach consensus on Thursday on two draft resolutions on a cessation of hostilities in Idlib. @UNOCHA's @UschiMuller
stressed more fighting will endanger & displace thousands & stretch resources already at limit. https://t.co/fCex0z0yHq https://t.co/DmiV0ZeGe5

.@antonioguterres & @PMaurerICRC issue joint appeal calling for urgent action to protect civilians & reduce suffering caused by the use of explosive weapons in cities. https://t.co/fcukUpdlQf https://t.co/IzT48bhd3f

"Business cannot succeed on a planet that fails. Jobs cannot be sustained on a dying planet."

--@antonioguterres calls on countries to join new #ClimateAction Summit jobs initiative. https://t.co/rilTmJTJbD #GlobalGoals https://t.co/VJHJhnrpRe

Child deaths reduced by nearly half & maternal deaths by over 1/3 since 2000. Yet every 11 seconds a pregnant woman or newborn still dies somewhere in the world. More details from @WHO: https://t.co/M5rZuPQ24k #GlobalGoals https://t.co/AnkQNQ2cD9

"There will be dozens of summits, meetings & side events. But I can distill the significance of all these discussions into two words: ambition and action."

"Dag Hammarskjöld gave his life for peace.

-- @antonioguterres marking the anniversary of the former Secretary-General's death. https://t.co/idViACOUTY https://t.co/VZRYE4cTFT

🥕 Eat less meat
🚿 Take shorter showers
🧺 Bring your own shopping bag

There are 272 million international migrants in the world.
🗺️ 61 million were born in Europe
👩 130 million are women & girls
👨‍💻 202 million are of working age

We can win the race against climate change, but we must #ActNow.

The ongoing healing of the ozone layer is an inspirational example of how the world can come together to address global challenges. It demonstrates that through joint #ClimateAction, we can win the race against climate change. https://t.co/kEANFwyjRH #OzoneDay https://t.co/YFRzULoHJ9

"I’m horrified by the level of devastation - I’ve never seen anything like this. #HurricaneDorian was not category 5, but category hell. It’s time to wake up and take urgent #ClimateAction." - @antonioguterres in the Bahamas. https://t.co/NztclzygfR https://t.co/tID7jaswG6

.@antonioguterres condemns Saturday's attacks on Aramco oil facilities in Saudi Arabia claimed by the Houthis. He calls upon all parties to exercise maximum restraint, prevent any escalation and comply with international humanitarian law. https://t.co/RySzQb2w1F

"At heart, democracy is about people. 25% of animals & plants are threatened with extinction. That’s nearly 1 million species.

"It’s not like we had a choice. We had to leave. We were starving."
